title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid information and receives a confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input valid username, email, and password fields
Submit the registration form
Verify registration is successful and user is prompted to login

title: User Registration Validation Errors
description: Verify registration form validations trigger for invalid inputs or missing mandatory fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Submit the form with empty required fields
Verify error messages display for missing fields
Input invalid email format and weak password
Submit the form
Verify validation errors for email format and password strength

title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can successfully login with valid credentials and receives JWT token with protected route access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify login success and JWT token received
Verify access to protected dashboard routes

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect username or password and error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify login failure and appropriate error message displayed

title: JWT Token Handling and Protected Route Enforcement
description: Ensure the JWT token is correctly handled in API requests and protected routes deny access when token is missing or invalid.

steps.description: Login and obtain JWT token
Access protected API endpoints with valid token
Verify access is granted
Remove or tamper JWT token and attempt to access protected routes
Verify access is denied with proper error response

title: Landing Page Content and Navigation
description: Verify the marketing landing page loads correctly, displays all sections, and navigation scrolls smoothly.

steps.description: Navigate to landing page
Verify Hero, Features, How It Works, Demo, and CTA sections are visible
Click navigation links or buttons for smooth scrolling
Verify smooth transitions and correct section visibility

title: Excel Upload - Valid Lumpsum Holdings File
description: Verify that a valid Excel file containing lumpsum mutual fund holdings can be uploaded and parsed correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to portfolio upload section
Select and upload a valid .xls or .xlsx file with correct columns and data structure for lumpsum investments
Verify file is parsed successfully and mutual fund holdings are extracted
Verify portfolio overview updates with uploaded funds

title: Excel Upload - Unsupported File Format
description: Verify that uploading a non-Excel or unsupported file format results in an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio upload
Attempt to upload a file with unsupported extension (e.g., .csv, .txt)
Verify upload is rejected and error message displayed

title: Excel Upload - Ambiguous Fund Name Resolution
description: Verify that when an ambiguous fund name is detected during upload, the system prompts for user resolution via modal and correctly updates portfolio upon selection.

steps.description: Upload a holdings Excel file containing ambiguous or conflicting fund names
Verify modal is displayed asking user to select correct fund name
Select appropriate fund name from modal options
Verify fund is resolved and added to user's portfolio correctly

title: Portfolio Fund List Display
description: Verify the fund list displays all user-uploaded funds with correct details including fund name, nickname, invested amount, and date.

steps.description: Login and navigate to portfolio page
Verify all funds are listed with accurate investment information
Check UI elements like delete buttons and stale data indicators are visible and functional

title: Fund Deletion Functionality
description: Verify the user can delete a fund from the portfolio and the list updates accordingly.

steps.description: Locate a fund entry in the portfolio list
Click the delete button for that fund
Confirm deletion prompt appears
Confirm deletion
Verify fund is removed from portfolio and UI updates accordingly

title: Portfolio NAV Estimation Accuracy
description: Verify that the system fetches live stock prices and accurately calculates estimated NAV and P&L metrics as per financial logic.

steps.description: Upload valid holdings file and input investment details
Trigger NAV estimation process
Verify live price data fetched correctly from external API (e.g., yfinance)
Calculate and verify the NAV estimation and profit/loss figures match expected manual calculations

title: NAV Estimation - Weekend and Holiday Handling
description: Validate the NAV estimation service correctly handles NAV calculations for weekends and market holidays by using last available prices.

steps.description: Set system date to a weekend or market holiday
Request NAV estimation for existing portfolio
Verify the system uses last valid NAV values and returns consistent estimation data

title: Portfolio Analysis Modal Display
description: Verify that the detailed portfolio analysis modal opens correctly displaying NAV, P&L metrics, and investment tracking details.

steps.description: From portfolio page, click on an individual fund to analyze
Verify modal window appears with detailed analysis content
Check charts, numbers, and textual data are accurate and formatted properly
Close the modal
Verify modal closes and focus returns to portfolio page

title: API Response Time and Error Handling
description: Verify that key backend API endpoints respond within acceptable time limits and handle errors gracefully with meaningful messages.

steps.description: Perform API calls for login, holdings upload, NAV estimation, and fund management
Verify responses are received within specified thresholds (e.g., under 2 seconds)
Simulate backend failures (invalid tokens, missing data, malformed requests)
Verify APIs return appropriate HTTP error codes and descriptive error messages without crashing

title: Frontend Responsive UI and Navigation
description: Verify the frontend UI is responsive on various screen sizes and navigation between pages and modals is smooth with no glitches.

steps.description: Resize browser or use emulators to test multiple device sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Verify all UI components adapt layout correctly and remain fully usable
Navigate through landing page, login, registration, dashboard, upload, portfolio analysis and logout
Verify smooth transitions and no broken links or UI freezes

title: Secure Logout and Session Expiry
description: Verify that the user can securely logout and that expired or removed tokens prevent access to protected routes.

steps.description: Login to the application successfully
Click logout button
Verify user is redirected to login or landing page
Attempt to access protected routes after logout
Verify access denied and redirected to login
Test session expiration by simulating token expiry
Verify user is logged out or redirected to login upon token expiry

title: Data Persistence and Retrieval from MongoDB
description: Verify that user, portfolio, and fund data are properly stored and retrieved from MongoDB according to schema specifications.

steps.description: Create user data by registration
Verify user data exists in MongoDB with correct fields
Upload portfolio holdings and save
Verify holdings and fund data persisted accurately
Retrieve saved portfolio and verify data integrity
